value.excerpt: Join us to learn about Writing Azure functions to Call the Power BI REST API with Ted Pattison!

value.title: Create a Power BI datamart in minutes
value.excerpt: Get started with Power BI datamarts- Create a Power BI datamart in minutes!

value.title: Power BI datasets get automatic refresh functionality through Microsoft Flow - Neowin
value.excerpt: Earlier this week, Microsoft unveiled the October update for Power BI Desktop, bringing new connectors, revamped Q&A, and plenty of other capabilities. On-premise data gateways for Power BI also ...

value.title: Preview data is now available in the dataset details page
value.excerpt: Preview data is now available!

value.title: Power BI June 2022 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the June 2022 update. We are excited to announce the general availability of the new Format Pane, error bars and information protection updates, table navigation improvements, Connect to datamarts and Power BI Data Storytelling features. There is more to explore, please continue to read on.

value.title: Updates to full report attachments for email subscriptions in Premium Gen2
value.excerpt: There are several updates coming to email subscriptions that use full report attachments that we want to make you aware of, including extending the maximum length of reports to 50 pages, appearance in the Gen2 metrics app, and deprecation in the original version of Power BI Premium.

value.title: Power BI template apps update capability is now available in preview
value.excerpt: With last month's update to Power BI Desktop, Microsoft began recommending new or popular template apps that could be utilized by users with ease. In continuation with this move, while detailing ...

value.title: May Release of SQL Server Reporting Services 2022
value.excerpt: May Release SQL Server Reporting Services

value.title: Enhanced refresh with the Power BI REST API is now generally available
value.excerpt: General availability announcement for Enhanced Refresh with the Power BI REST API. Perform fine-grain refresh operations for improved scalability.

value.title: On-premises data gateway May 2022 update is now available
value.excerpt: On-premises data gateway May 2022 update is now available

value.title: Power BI Report Server May 2022 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: We’re excited to bring you a new version of Power BI Report Server this Spring! With the May 2022 update, we have a variety of new enhancements, including Dynamic format strings support, multi row card selection, canvas zoom, updated slicer defaults and many more. Please continue to read on!

value.title: Announcing general availability of the ExecuteQueries REST API
value.excerpt: We are happy to announce that the ExecuteQueries REST API is now GA. By using this REST API, you can query datasets in Power BI from practically any modern environment on any platform, as long as you can authenticate with Azure Active Directory (AAD) and construct a Web request. The query functionality

value.title: Microsoft finally adds Power BI integrations to PowerPoint and Outlook
value.excerpt: Microsoft has announced the addition of a Power BI add-in to PowerPoint and Outlook that will allow businesses to share live and easily manipulated data as part of office presentations. The company believes it will add an extra dimension to storytelling with data,

value.title: Announcing general availability of automatic aggregations
value.excerpt: Today, we are excited to announce General Availability (GA) of automatic aggregations, along with several important improvements. By using automatic aggregations in Power BI Premium, you can unlock cloud-scale data volumes for interactive analysis. Automatic aggregations import data into the dataset

value.title: Composite models on SQL Server Analysis Services
value.excerpt: SQL Server 2022 Analysis Services will support composite models and it is now ready for you to try out with the CTP2 that has just launched. After you install this CTP for SQL Server 2022 on a server, tabular models are hosted on that server can now be used to create a composite model with.

value.title: Democratize enterprise analytics with Microsoft Power BI
value.excerpt: Microsoft Build represents the ultimate developer event. A hundred thousand developers from across the world gather for three days with their peers to learn, engage, and collaborate on the latest innovations and tools from Microsoft.

value.title: Announcing public preview of datamart in Power BI
value.excerpt: Announcing public preview of datamart in Power BI, a new Power BI Premium self-service capability that enables users to uncover actionable insights through their own independent and dependent data sets. For the first time ever, we are empowering everyone with the right-sized ability to build datamarts

value.title: What’s new in SQL Server 2022 Analysis Services CTP 2.0
value.excerpt: SQL Server 2022 Analysis Services is now available for public preview! SSAS 2022 tabular models now join forces in Power BI Desktop with other data to create composite models, speed up MDX queries used in Excel PivotTables, allow for more control over resources, and get data back to business users faster

value.title: Tell a story with your data. Announcing the all-new Power BI integration for PowerPoint.
value.excerpt: We’re thrilled to be shipping Power BI Data storytelling that lets you add Power BI reports and bookmarks to your slides and enjoy the delightful interactive experience of Power BI inside your presentations. With data storytelling, data will always be up to date in your slides, whether you’re building

value.title: Goals in Power BI is becoming ‘metrics’ and is moving to GA!
value.excerpt: We are excited to announce general availability for metrics in Power BI (formerly called goals) along with new features to deliver scorecarding scenarios even more effectively within Power BI. Additionally, we’re pleased to share plans for how Power BI will work with the new Viva Goals offering from

value.title: Exportable Formatted Data Tables (Preview)
value.excerpt: Users can author formatted tables using a modern low code web-based authoring experience in the Power BI service.

value.title: Highlights of the Power BI update for May 2022
value.excerpt: The Power BI update for May 2022 is here and as usual, I will review and highlight all the updates so you are always up to date!  Integrate Charticulator in Power BI: https://ideas.powerbi.com/ideas/idea/?ideaid=6d7d6592-3aff-4b83-a4cf-806b593fc841  Charticulator design challenge: https://community.powerbi.com/t5/Charticulator-Design-Challenge/con-p/PBI_CharticulatorChallenge/tab/entries

value.excerpt: Join us to learn about Power Query custom functions with Ted Pattison and special guest Alex Powers!

value.title: Announcing: Action bar for interactive reports in the Power BI tab for Microsoft Teams
value.excerpt: We’re excited to announce that the Power BI tab in Microsoft Teams is getting a new action bar for interactive reports. The action bar enables users in the Power BI tab to use all the capabilities they have in the service when interactive reports are added to channels, chats, or meetings in Microsoft

value.title: Power BI May 2022 Feature Summary
value.excerpt: Welcome to the May 2022 update. We are thrilled to announce the general availability of Canvas zoom and Data point rectangle select features, Field parameters and Error bars for columns and line combination charts new preview features, new Format pane and managing composite models preview feature updates.
